mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity( startDate, owner, name, id, endDate, description, createTime, createBy, cost ) values ( #{startDate}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{id}, #{endDate}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{cost} )
mapper.update: update tbl_activity set startDate = #{startDate}, owner = #{owner}, name = #{name}, endDate = #{endDate}, description = #{description}, editTime = #{editTime}, editBy = #{editBy}, cost = #{cost} where id = #{id}
